movie_title: Coffee prices: Climate conditions, tariffs could push cost of beans higher this year
introduction: Global coffee consumption is set to reach new historical peaks this October, according to a fresh re

vocabulary.definition: highest points; tops of mountains or hills
vocabulary.example: The hikers reached the peaks of the mountain after a long and challenging climb.

vocabulary.definition: taxes on imported or exported goods
vocabulary.example: The new tariffs imposed by the government led to an increase in the prices of electronics.

vocabulary.definition: lasting for a long time; extended
vocabulary.example: The drought in the region resulted in a prolonged shortage of water.

vocabulary.definition: secondary shocks following the main shock of an earthquake
vocabulary.example: The aftershocks of the financial crisis were felt for years in the global economy.

vocabulary.definition: substances added to something to increase its bulk or weight
vocabulary.example: Some food manufacturers add fillers to their products to reduce production costs.

vocabulary.definition: able to withstand or recover quickly from difficult conditions
vocabulary.example: Despite facing challenges, the community proved to be resilient and bounced back stronger.
